name: rumbustiousness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
behaviour that is noisy, energetic, and rough: He has that natural Australian rumbustiousness about him. The hard-nosed rumbustiousness of the Ireland pack when playing at home may be too much for the Welsh team.
More examplesFewer examplesHer style is rumbustiousness crossed with rebellion.There is a natural tendency for little boys to enjoy stories with a certain rumbustiousness. Ray Anderson combines the rumbustiousness of a New Orleans tailgate trombonist with modern techniques.
